name: GetStorePromoRules
description:
Retrieve promo rules for a specified store.

Use this tool to get detailed information about the promotional rules set up for a specific e-commerce store using its ID.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store to retrieve promo rules from.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the response. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: records_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of promo rule records to return. Default is 10, maximum is 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination, with a default value of 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.
